name: Last Express, The

write_file.content:
[sdl]
sensitivity=30
fullresolution=desktop
windowresolution=original
fullscreen=true
output=opengl
[render]
aspect=true
scaler=normal2x
[autoexec]
mount C "$GAMEDIR/" -t dir
mount C "$GAMEDIR/cloud_saves" -t overlay
mount D "$GAMEDIR/data" -t cdrom
c:
express.exe
exit

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select installer
- inno: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/innoextract/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/LastExpress.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $inno
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$setup"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR/data
    file: mkdir
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR/cloud_saves
    file: mkdir
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/data
    src: $CACHE/data
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/EXPRESS.EXE
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/HD.HPF
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/Manual.pdf
- write_file:
    content: '[sdl]

      sensitivity=30

      fullresolution=desktop

      windowresolution=original

      fullscreen=true

      output=opengl

      [render]

      aspect=true

      scaler=normal2x

      [autoexec]

      mount C "$GAMEDIR/" -t dir

      mount C "$GAMEDIR/cloud_saves" -t overlay

      mount D "$GAMEDIR/data" -t cdrom

      c:

      express.exe

      exit'
    file: $GAMEDIR/LastExpress.conf
